puzzle_1.description: Create a word with only one vowel

puzzle_2.description: Create a word that is exactly 6 letters long

puzzle_3.description: Create a word without using the letter A or E

puzzle_4.description: Create a word that starts with the letter T

puzzle_5.description: Create a word that ends with the letter N

puzzle_6.description: Create a word with exactly two vowels

puzzle_7.description: Create a word that contains the letter Z

puzzle_8.description: Create a word that is a palindrome

puzzle_9.description: Create a word that has alternating vowels and consonants

puzzle_10.description: Create a word with all consonants

puzzle_11.description: Create a word with at least three syllables

puzzle_12.description: Create a word that contains double letters

puzzle_13.description: Create a word with exactly one consonant

puzzle_14.description: Create a word that is exactly 4 letters long

puzzle_15.description: Create a word that contains the letter Q

puzzle_16.description: Create a word that has the same first and last letter
